def new_schema_cast_columns(old_schema:dict, new_schema:str, db_name:str, table_name:str):
    '''
    '''
    from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
    spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
    spark.conf.set("spark.databricks.delta.schema.autoMerge.enabled", "true")

    import json
    new_fields = json.loads(new_schema)['fields']

    
    old_fields = old_schema['fields']

    column_type_changed = {}
    for new_field in new_fields:
        for old_field in old_fields:
            if old_field['name'] == new_field['name'] and old_field['type'] != new_field['type']:
                column_type_changed.update(dict({old_field['name']: new_field['type']}))
    if column_type_changed != {}:
        from pyspark.sql.functions import col
        # load to dataframe, change types
        df = spark.read.format('delta').table(f'{db_name}.{table_name}')
        for column in column_type_changed:
            df = df.withColumn(column,col(column).cast(types_to_change[column]))
        
        # save df with new types overwriting the schema
        df.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").option("overwriteSchema",True).saveAsTable(f'{db_name}.{table_name}')

@logging_to_appins
def apply_new_schema(db_name, table_name):
    '''
    doc string
    '''
    from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
    from notebookutils import mssparkutils
    from pyspark.sql.types import StructType
    import json
    spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
    spark.conf.set("spark.databricks.delta.schema.autoMerge.enabled", "true")

    storage_account= spark.sparkContext.environment.get('dataLakeAccountName', 'get') + ".dfs.core.windows.net"
    config_storage_container = 'abfss://odw-config@' + storage_account + '/'
    storage_acc_name = spark.sparkContext.environment.get('dataLakeAccountName', 'get')

    # json_schema_folder='harmonised_table_definitions'
    # json_schema_path = config_storage_container + '/' + json_schema_folder
    # read orchestration json to determine schema location 
    if db_name.lower() == 'odw_standardised_db':
        
        orchestration_json = spark.read.text("abfss://odw-config@"+storage_acc_name+".dfs.core.windows.net/orchestration/orchestration.json", wholetext=True).first().value
        json_config_dict = json.loads(orchestration_json)
        schema_location = "abfss://odw-config@"+storage_acc_name+".dfs.core.windows.net/" + next(config['Standardised_Table_Definition'] for config in json_config_dict['definitions'] if config['Standardised_Table_Name'] == table_name)
        schema = spark.read.text(schema_location, wholetext=True).first().value

    elif db_name.lower() == 'odw_harmonised_db':
        schema_location = next(file.path for file in mssparkutils.fs.ls("abfss://odw-config@"+storage_acc_name+".dfs.core.windows.net/harmonised_table_definitions/") if file.name.lower().split('.json')[0] == table_name)
        schema = spark.read.text(schema_location, wholetext=True).first().value

    elif db_name.lower() == 'odw_curated_db':
        schema_location = next(file.path for file in mssparkutils.fs.ls("abfss://odw-config@"+storage_acc_name+".dfs.core.windows.net/curated_table_definitions/") if file.name.lower().split('.json')[0] == table_name)
        schema = spark.read.text(schema_location, wholetext=True).first().value

    elif db_name.lower() == 'odw_config_db':
        if table_name.lower() == 'datalabs_log':
            schema = 'hello'
        elif table_name.lower() == 'raw_to_std_outstanding_files':
            schema = 'world'
        else:
            raise RuntimeError("No Schema Found")

    current_json_str = spark.read.format('delta').table(f'{db_name}.{table_name}').schema.jsonValue()    
    new_schema_cast_columns(current_json_str, schema, db_name, table_name)
    # attempt to cast existing columns with new type type 
    
    # if successful, add new columns from new schema schema 
    new_struct = StructType.fromJson(json.loads(schema))
    spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()
    spark.conf.set("spark.databricks.delta.schema.autoMerge.enabled", "true")
    df = spark.createDataFrame([], new_struct)
    df.write.option("mergeSchema", "true").mode("append").format('delta').saveAsTable(f'{db_name}.{table_name}')

apply_new_schema("odw_harmonised_db","abdullah_test")
